        y - - int position on the y axis in the room

      • updateFrame

        public void updateFrame()
        The core method which updates the current image in the animation sequence

        A variable, tempDelay counts down each system update, when it hits 0, the next image in the sequence becomes the image being shown as the sprites image. tempDelay then reverts back to the variable Delay and keeps running unless excplicitly told not to. If another variable, animating, is set to false, this whole loop stops. A check is also run if playOnce is set to true to find if the sequence has reached its desired end and should now revert to another animation.
